name: @jadesrochers/filereworker
author: Jared Desrochers
description: Get information on data files, split and preserve headings

scripts.packagePatch: npm run test && npm version patch && npm publish && git push -u origin master
scripts.updatePatch: npm update && npm run test && npm version patch && npm publish && git push -u origin master
scripts.packageMinor: npm run test && npm version patch && npm publish && git push -u origin master
